https://tmrev.io/movie/142167-Down: Diary of a Mad Band - Europe in the Year of VI 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fRCklVHUj6drnA4HX0vUVuLgATT.jpg The 130-minute DVD features footage documenting the 2006 return of Down from the practice room through the band's first European tour, and a bonus behind-the-scenes featurette entitled "Tyrades and Shananigans". Down: Diary of a Mad Band - Europe in the Year of VI
